      82             : #define ELEMENT_FLAG_BIT(n_) NODE_FLAG_BIT(NODE_TYPE_SPECIFIC_BITS_OFFSET + (n_))
      83             : 
      84             : // Element-specific flags
      85             : enum {
      86             :   // Set if the element has a pending style change.
      87             :   ELEMENT_HAS_PENDING_RESTYLE =                 NODE_SHARED_RESTYLE_BIT_1,
      88             : 
      89             :   // Set if the element is a potential restyle root (that is, has a style
      90             :   // change pending _and_ that style change will attempt to restyle
      91             :   // descendants).
      92             :   ELEMENT_IS_POTENTIAL_RESTYLE_ROOT =           NODE_SHARED_RESTYLE_BIT_2,
      93             : 
      94             :   // Set if the element has a pending animation-only style change as
      95             :   // part of an animation-only style update (where we update styles from
      96             :   // animation to the current refresh tick, but leave everything else as
      97             :   // it was).
      98             :   ELEMENT_HAS_PENDING_ANIMATION_ONLY_RESTYLE =  ELEMENT_FLAG_BIT(0),
      99             : 
     100             :   // Set if the element is a potential animation-only restyle root (that
     101             :   // is, has an animation-only style change pending _and_ that style
     102             :   // change will attempt to restyle descendants).
     103             :   ELEMENT_IS_POTENTIAL_ANIMATION_ONLY_RESTYLE_ROOT = ELEMENT_FLAG_BIT(1),
     104             : 
     105             :   // Set if this element has a pending restyle with an eRestyle_SomeDescendants
     106             :   // restyle hint.
     107             :   ELEMENT_IS_CONDITIONAL_RESTYLE_ANCESTOR = ELEMENT_FLAG_BIT(2),
     108             : 
     109             :   // Just the HAS_PENDING bits, for convenience
     110             :   ELEMENT_PENDING_RESTYLE_FLAGS =
     111             :     ELEMENT_HAS_PENDING_RESTYLE |
     112             :     ELEMENT_HAS_PENDING_ANIMATION_ONLY_RESTYLE,
     113             : 
     114             :   // Just the IS_POTENTIAL bits, for convenience
     115             :   ELEMENT_POTENTIAL_RESTYLE_ROOT_FLAGS =
     116             :     ELEMENT_IS_POTENTIAL_RESTYLE_ROOT |
     117             :     ELEMENT_IS_POTENTIAL_ANIMATION_ONLY_RESTYLE_ROOT,
     118             : 
     119             :   // All of the restyle bits together, for convenience.
     120             :   ELEMENT_ALL_RESTYLE_FLAGS = ELEMENT_PENDING_RESTYLE_FLAGS |
     121             :                               ELEMENT_POTENTIAL_RESTYLE_ROOT_FLAGS |
     122             :                               ELEMENT_IS_CONDITIONAL_RESTYLE_ANCESTOR,
     123             : 
     124             :   // Set if this element is marked as 'scrollgrab' (see bug 912666)
     125             :   ELEMENT_HAS_SCROLLGRAB = ELEMENT_FLAG_BIT(3),
     126             : 
     127             :   // Remaining bits are for subclasses
     128             :   ELEMENT_TYPE_SPECIFIC_BITS_OFFSET = NODE_TYPE_SPECIFIC_BITS_OFFSET + 4
     129             : };

    1655             : nsresult                                                                    \
